title: Shopping and Services 1
sentences: How much does this bread cost?
That is a very favorable price.
Do you have a special offer today?
I need a bag for my purchases.
At which register can I pay?
Do you have change for 50 Euro?
I would like to exchange this skirt.
Do you have this shoe in size 40?
an der Kasse ist sehr lang.
The line at the register is very long.
I am looking for the post office to send a package.
I have to withdraw money from the ATM.
Can I pay with a card here?
What are the opening hours of the shop?
I need an appointment at the hairdresser.
Gibt es auf diese Jacke einen
Is there a discount on this jacket?
I am looking for a gift for my mother.
Where do I find the fruit department?
The shop is very crowded today.
Do you also have organic products?
dictionary:
der Supermarkt - supermarket
kosten - to cost
der Preis - price
das Angebot - offer
die Tüte - bag
bezahlen - to pay
das Wechselgeld - change (money)
umtauschen - to exchange / return
die Größe - size
die Umkleidekabine - changing room
die Schlange - line / queue
die Post - post office
der Geldautomat - ATM
die Bank - bank
der Kassenbon - receipt
die Karte - card
die Öffnungszeiten - opening hours
der Friseur - hairdresser
schließen - to close
der Rabatt - discount
das Geschenk - gift
die Briefmarke - stamp
die Obstabteilung - fruit department
der Laden - shop / store
das Bio-Produkt - organic product
